mapper.select:
select tr.id, us.name as owner, tr.money, tr.name, expectedDate, cu.name as customerId, stage, tr.type, tr.source, ac.name as activityId, co.fullname as contactsId, tr.createBy, tr.createTime, tr.editBy, tr.editTime, tr.description, tr.contactSummary, tr.nextContactTime
from tbl_tran tr join tbl_user us on tr.owner=us.id join tbl_customer cu on tr.customerId=cu.id left join tbl_activity ac on tr.activityId=ac.id left join tbl_contacts co on tr.contactsId=co.id where tr.id=#{id}
